com.appriskgame.controller

Class CardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appriskgame.controller.CardController

  • public class CardController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for Card allocation and exchange of cards for armies. It also contains methods to check invalid cards and card types.
    Author:
    Shruthi, Sahana
